sentences.english: It provides an important basis for accurately determining if oil tank truck pollutes jet fuel.
sentences.chinese: 为准确判断油罐车是否污染喷气燃料提供了重要依据。

sentences.english: The appeal of the Hilux is further enhanced by styling changes to give a more rugged look.
sentences.chinese: 进一步提高东风油罐车造型变化通过向更坚固的看。

sentences.english: The freight car was tank cars and the hopper cars that piled up cokes.
sentences.chinese: 货物车辆大部分是装著焦炭漏斗货车的或著油罐车。

sentences.english: An oil tanker drove through Hengshan County, Shaanxi Province, China, Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 一辆油罐车穿行陕西省横山县。
解放油罐车挡位和优雅。

sentences.english: The driver has a revised six-speed transmission at his disposal.
sentences.chinese: 油罐车司机有一个修正传输来支配。

sentences.english: The modal response of liquid slosh in horizontally cylindrical container was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 以油罐车为背景，研究平放柱箱液体晃动的模态响应。

sentences.english: In addition, quietness has been built in to the cabin to enhance the audibility of conversation.
sentences.chinese: 此外，解放油罐车已经建在机舱内提高可听到的谈话。

sentences.english: For example, tanker loading and unloading of dangerous goods need to put off the wheel, anti-skid row.
sentences.chinese: 例如风险品油罐车装卸时需求摆车轮挡，防滑行。
